card.name: Electabuzz
card.text: Whenever Electabuzz attacks for the first time each turn, untap all attacking Pokémon. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.

card.name: Magmar
card.text: {1}{R}, {T}: Magmar deals 2 damage to target Pokémon. If that Pokémon would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Pinsir
card.text: Trample Whenever Pinsir deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it. If Pinsir has dealt 6 or more damage to players this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on each Pokémon you control instead.

card.name: Tauros
card.text: Trample Whenever Tauros deals combat damage to a player, destroy target artifact that player controls with mana value less than or equal to that damage. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on target Pokémon.

card.name: Magikarp
card.text: {T}: Put a splash counter on Magikarp. Remove three splash counters from Magikarp: You may search your library for a card named Gyarados, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. You may evolve Magikarp without paying evolve costs this turn.

card.name: Gyarados
card.text: Evolve from Magikarp {4}{U}{R} Whenever Gyarados enters or evolves, it deals 6 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets. Whenever a permanent dealt damage this way dies this turn, if Gyarados is evolved, draw a card.

card.name: Lapras
card.text: When Lapras enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life. {2}{W}{U}, Exile Lapras: Exile target Pokémon. If it's your turn, draw a card.

card.name: Ditto
card.text: {2/U}{2/U}{2/U}: Ditto becomes a copy of another target Pokémon or artifact, except its name is Ditto and it has this ability.

card.name: Eevee
card.text: You may pay {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} less to evolve Pokémon. This effect reduces only the amount of colored mana you pay. This effect can't reduce the mana in that cost by more than one mana.

card.name: Vaporeon
card.text: Evolve from Eevee {2}{U} Whenever a Pokémon you control evolves, scry 1 and draw a card.

card.name: Jolteon
card.text: Evolve from Eevee {2}{R/W} Whenever a Pokémon you control evolves, tap up to two target Pokémon you don't control. Put a stun counter on each of them.

card.name: Flareon
card.text: Evolve from Eevee {2}{R} Whenever a Pokémon you control evolves, Flareon deals 3 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets.

card.name: Porygon
card.text: Whenever a player casts a spell, Porygon becomes that spell's colors. Porygon has lifelink if it's white, hexproof if it's blue, wither if it's black, menace if it's red, and reach if it's green.

card.name: Omanyte
card.text: {U}{R}, Sacrifice Omanyte: Surveil 2, then you may exile the top card of your library. You may cast that card this turn. Fossil—{1}{U}{R}, Exile three other cards from your graveyard.

card.text: Snorlax enters tapped with three stun counters on it. Whenever you gain life, untap Snorlax.

card.name: Articuno

card.name: Moltres

Mewtwo
card.text: When Mewtwo enters, for each Pokémon you don't control, create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 2/2 Clone. When Mewtwo dies, return it to the battlefield transformed.

card.name: Mewtwo, Redeemed
card.text: Flying Each other Pokémon you control gets +2/+2 if it shares a color with a Pokémon an opponent controls.

card.name: Mew
Red
card.text: [+2]: Exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may cast Pokémon cards exiled this way. [−3]: Create Red's Pikachu, a legendary 4/4 red and white Electric Pokémon token with first strike, lifelink, and haste. [−7]: You may put any number of Pokémon cards from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Blue
card.text: Blue spells and red spells you cast cost {1} less to cast for each card you own in exile that shares a card type with that spell. [+1]: Draw a card, then you may exile a card from your hand. [-4]: Create a token that's a copy of target Pokémon you don't control, except it has haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Green
card.text: You can spend mana of any type to evolve Pokémon. [+1]: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your hand. [−3]: Search your library for a land card or a Pokémon card with an evolve ability, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Add {C}{C}{C}{C}. Spend this mana only to evolve Pokémon.

card.name: Brock
card.text: [+1]: Add {R} or {G}. Pokémon spells you cast this turn can't be countered. [+1]: Draw a card if you control a Pokémon with power 4 or greater. [−7]: You get an emblem with "Whenever a source deals damage to a Pokémon you control, that Pokémon deals that much damage to that source's controller."

card.name: Misty
card.text: Whenever a spell or ability you control counters a spell, put two loyalty counters on Misty. [+1]: Draw a card. [−3]: Return another target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.

card.name: Lt. Surge
card.text: Pokémon you control have haste. [+1]: Create two 1/1 red Electric Pokémon tokens named Voltorb. Exile them at the beginning of the next end step. [−4]: Untap all Pokémon that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.

card.name: Erika
card.text: [+1]: Create a 1/1 black and green Grass Poison Pokémon token with lifelink named Oddish. [-2]: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. [−5]: Pokémon you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.

card.name: Koga
card.text: [+1]: Up to one target Pokémon gets +2/+0 and gains wither until end of turn. [-2]: Put two -1/-1 counters on target Pokémon. Then you gain life equal to the number of -1/-1 counters on that Pokémon. [−6]: You get an emblem with "Pokémon you control have '{B}: This Pokémon can't be blocked this turn.'"

card.name: Sabrina
card.text: [+1]: Look at the top card of each opponent's library, then scry 1. [-3]: Scry 2. Target Pokémon gets -X/-0 until your next turn, where X is the number of cards you looked at while scrying this turn. [-8]: Gain control of target opponent during that player's next turn.

card.name: Blaine
card.text: [+1]: Exile the top card of your library. You may cast that card. If you don't, Blaine deals 2 damage to each opponent. [-2]: Blaine deals damage to target Pokémon equal to the number of Mountains you control. [-3]: You may cast target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard this turn. If that spell would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.

card.name: Giovanni
card.text: [+1]: Target player draws a card and loses 1 life. [-2]: Target player sacrifices a Pokémon or trainer. [-6]: Search target opponent's library for a Pokémon card and put that card onto the battlefield under your control. Then that player shuffles.

card.name: Professor Oak
card.text: [+1]: Choose a Pokémon. Until your next turn, whenever that Pokémon attacks, draw a card. [-3]: Exile target Pokémon with power 4 or greater. [-7]: You get an emblem with "Pokémon you control have indestructible."

card.name: Lorelei
card.text: Whenever you gain life, put a loyalty counter on Lorelei. [0]: Tap or untap up to one target Pokémon. You gain 1 life. [-3]: Put three stun counters on target nonland permanent.

card.name: Bruno
card.text: Whenever you attack, put a loyalty counter on Bruno. [-1]: Put a +1/+1 counter on target Pokémon. [-2]: Target Pokémon you control fights target Pokémon.

card.name: Agatha
card.text: If a Pokémon with a soulbind counter on it would die, instead exile it and create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 2/2 Ghost. [+1]: Scry X, where X is one plus the number of Ghost Pokémon you control. Draw a card. [-2]: Put a soulbind counter on target nontoken Pokémon..

card.name: Lance (PKTO)
card.text: [+2]: Lance deals 3 damage to any target. You gain 3 life. [-3]: Until end of turn, Lance becomes a 6/6 Dragon Pokémon with flying, vigilance, indestructible, and haste. [-11]: Gain control of all Pokémon.

card.name: Bill
card.text: Draw two cards.

card.name: Poké Ball
card.text: Exile the top three cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may cast Pokémon cards exiled this way.

card.name: Great Ball
card.text: Scry 3, then you may reveal the top card of your library. If a Pokémon card is revealed this way, draw a card.

card.name: Safari Ball
card.text: Look at the top six cards of your library. Put up to one Pokémon card with mana value 4 or less from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Ultra Ball
card.text: Search your library for a Pokémon card with mana value lesser than or equal to the highest mana value among Pokémon target opponent controls. Put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Master Ball
card.text: Search your library for a Pokémon card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Switch
card.text: Choose target Pokémon you control. Reveal a Pokémon card with equal or lesser mana value from your hand. If you do, return the chosen Pokémon to its owner's hand and put the revealed card onto the battlefield.

card.name: Poké Flute
card.text: Remove all stun counters from Pokémon you control and untap them. Those Pokémon get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Old Rod
card.text: Search target opponent's library for a Pokémon card with mana value X or less and put that card onto the battlefield under your control. Then that player shuffles. X can't be greater than 3.

card.name: Revive (PKTO)
card.text: Choose target Pokémon card with mana value 3 or less in your graveyard. Return it to the battlefield or to your hand.

card.name: Max Revive
card.text: Choose target Pokémon card in your graveyard. You may return it to the battlefield evolved onto up to one target Pokémon you control. If you don't, return it to the battlefield.

card.name: Energy Search
card.text: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Mysterious Fossil
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Mysterious Fossil: Search your library for a Pokémon card with fossil, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. If you didn't put a card onto the battlefield this way, draw a card.

card.name: Explore
card.text: You may play an additional land this turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Revitalize
card.text: You gain 3 life. Draw a card.

card.name: Show of Force
card.text: Show of Force deals 1 damage to each Pokémon you don't control. You may exile a card from your hand. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Investigate
card.text: Scry 2, then draw a card.

card.name: Potion
card.text: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn by a source of your choice. You gain 3 life.

card.name: Lemonade
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target Pokémon. That Pokémon gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Growth
card.text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: X Attack
card.text: Target Pokémon gets +3/+0 and gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: X Defense
card.text: Target Pokémon gets +0/+4 until end of turn. Untap it. At this turn's next end of combat, tap each Pokémon that was blocked by that Pokémon this turn and put a stun counter on each of them.

card.name: Guard Spec.
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target Pokémon you control. It gains hexproof until end of turn.

card.name: Antidote
card.text: Target Pokémon you control gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Remove all counters from it. You gain life equal to twice the number of counters removed this way. Until end of turn, that Pokémon can't have counters put on it.

card.name: Turn to Stone
card.text: Destroy target Pokémon or trainer.

card.name: Body Slam
card.text: Target Pokémon you control fights target Pokémon you don't control. If the Pokémon you control has trample, excess damage is dealt to that Pokémon's controller instead.

card.name: Slash
card.text: Slash deals 4 damage to target Pokémon.

card.name: Whirlwind (PKTO)
card.text: Return target Pokémon or trainer to its owner's hand. Its controller draws a card.

card.name: Sing
card.text: Tap all Pokémon target player controls and put a stun counter on each of them.

card.name: Swift
card.text: Destroy target nonland permanent.

card.name: Disable
card.text: Return target spell to its owner's hand. That player can't cast spells with the same name as that spell until the end of their next turn. If {B} was spent to cast this spell, that player loses 2 life.

card.name: Ember
card.text: Ember deals 2 damage to any target. If a permanent dealt damage by Ember would die this turn, exile it instead.

card.name: Gust
card.text: Choose target Pokémon. If that Pokémon is attacking, Gust deals 2 damage to it for each {W} spent to cast this spell. If that Pokémon has flying, Gust deals 4 damage to it for each {G} spent to cast this spell.

card.name: Slam
card.text: Destroy target tapped Pokémon.

card.name: Poison Sting
card.text: Put a -1/-1 counter on target Pokémon. Draw a card.

card.name: Glare
card.text: Target Pokémon can't block this turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Flash (PKTO)
card.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Night Shade
card.text: Destroy target nonblack Pokémon.

card.name: Aurora Beam
card.text: Exile target Pokémon. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Tackle
card.text: Destroy target attacking or blocking Pokémon.

card.name: Toxic
card.text: All Pokémon get -4/-4 until end of turn.

card.name: Blizzard (PKTO)
card.text: This spell can't be countered. Destroy all Pokémon.

card.name: Reflect
card.text: Counter target non-Pokémon spell.

card.name: Fire Blast
Solar Beam
Hydro Pump
Release
card.text: Counter target Pokémon spell.

card.name: Vine Whip
card.text: Choose one — • Destroy target artifact. • Destroy target enchantment. • Exile target card from a graveyard.

card.name: Guillotine
card.text: This spell can't be countered. Target Pokémon or trainer loses indestructible until end of turn. Destroy it. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Substitute
card.text: Choose one — • Target Pokémon you control gains hexproof from the color of your choice until end of turn. • Remove target attacking or blocking Pokémon from combat.

card.name: Pilfer
card.text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

card.name: Mirror Move
card.text: Copy target instant spell, sorcery spell, activated ability, or triggered ability. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Double Kick
card.text: Target Pokémon you control fights target Pokémon you don't control. When the Pokémon you control wins the fight, it fights another target Pokémon you don't control.

card.name: Prepare for Trouble
card.text: Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.

card.name: Razor Leaf
card.text: Target Pokémon you control deals damage equal to its power to target Pokémon you don't control. If the Pokémon you don't control has flying, destroy it instead.

card.name: Water Gun
card.text: You may exile any number of cards from your graveyard as you cast this spell. It costs {1} less to cast for each card exiled this way. Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}.

card.name: Petal Dance
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, untap all permanents you control.

card.name: Dig
card.text: Create two 2/1 red Ground Pokémon tokens named Diglett. {2}: Exile Dig from your hand. For as long as it remains exiled, you may cast it on a later turn for {1}{R}. If you do, those tokens gain haste.

card.name: Skull Bash
card.text: Target player discards two cards. Pokémon you control gain menace until end of turn.

card.name: Psychic
card.text: Exile target Pokémon. Its controller discards a card at random.

card.name: Thunder Stone
card.text: {T}: Add {W}. Whenever a Pokémon you control evolves, you gain 4 life. Sacrifice Thunder Stone: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Leaf Stone
card.text: {T}: Add {G}. Whenever a Pokémon you control evolves, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Sacrifice Leaf Stone: Add {G}{G}.

card.name: Water Stone
card.text: {T}: Add {U}. Whenever a Pokémon you control evolves, tap target Pokémon you don't control and put a stun counter on it. Sacrifice Water Stone: Scry 3.

card.name: Fire Stone
card.text: {T}: Add {R}. Whenever a Pokémon you control evolves, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card until your next end step. Sacrifice Fire Stone: It deals 2 damage to target Pokémon or trainer.

card.name: Moon Stone
card.text: {T}: Add {B}. Whenver a Pokémon you control evolves, reveal the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard. Each opponent loses 2 life. Sacrifice Moon Stone: Create a Treasure token.

card.name: Ancient Slab
card.text: When Ancient Slab enters, draw a card. {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}: Add two mana in any combination of colors. Spend this mana only to cast legendary spells.

card.name: Pokémon Storage System
card.text: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, exile all cards from your hand face down. At the beginning of your upkeep, return all cards you own exiled with Pokémon Storage System to your hand, then draw a card.

card.name: Town Map
card.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Town Map: Search your library for a land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Super Repel
card.text: Pokémon can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each Pokémon they control that's attacking you.

card.name: Nugget
card.text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Nugget: Add one mana of any color. When Nugget is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Mysterious Feather
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Mysterious Feather: Add one mana of any color. Whenever a Pokémon you control evolves, return Mysterious Feather from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Pokédex
card.text: {2}, {T}: Draw a card, then put a data counter on Pokédex. Then if there are four or more data counters on it, sacrifice it. If you do, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a Pokémon card. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Rage
card.text: Enchant Pokémon Whenever enchanted Pokémon attacks, it deals 3 damage to target Pokémon. At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice Rage unless a Pokémon died this turn.

card.name: Ice Beam
card.text: Enchant Pokémon Whenever enchanted Pokémon attacks, tap target permanent and put a stun counter on it.

card.name: Hyper Beam
card.text: Enchant Pokémon Enchanted Pokémon has "{T}: Destroy target nonland permanent. Put a stun counter on this Pokémon. Activate only as a sorcery."

card.name: Swords Dance
card.text: Enchant Pokémon At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted Pokémon. When Swords Dance is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Mega Kick
card.text: Flash Enchant Pokémon Enchanted Pokémon gets +1/+1 and has first strike.

card.name: Dream Eater (PKTO)
card.text: Enchant Pokémon Whenever enchanted Pokémon deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.

card.name: Frozen
card.text: Enchant Pokémon When Frozen enters, tap enchanted Pokémon. Enchanted Pokémon doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

card.name: Pewter Gym
card.text: You may have each nontoken Pokémon you control enter with an additional +1/+1 counter on it. If you don't, it gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Cerulean Gym
card.text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may reveal the top card of your library. If you do, counter that spell if it has the same mana value as the revealed card. If a spell is not countered this way, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Vermilion Gym
card.text: Whenever you attack, create a 1/1 red Electric Pokémon token named Voltorb that's tapped and attacking. When you do, target attacking Pokémon gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Celadon Gym
card.text: Pokémon you control have reach and "{T}: Add one mana of any color."

card.name: Saffron Gym
card.text: When Saffron Gym enters, scry 1, then draw a card. The first time you would draw a card each turn, scry 1, then draw a card instead.

card.name: Fuchsia Gym
card.text: Whenever a Pokémon an opponent controls dies, if its toughness was less than 1, draw a card. {1}{B}{G}: Put a wither counter on target Pokémon.

card.name: Cinnabar Gym
card.text: Whenever you attack, choose odd or even, then exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. If it's a nonland card with mana value of the chosen quality, create a Treasure token.

card.name: Viridian Gym
card.text: Whenever a Pokémon an opponent controls dies, you create a Treasure token unless that player pays 2 life. {2}{B}: Put a deathtouch counter on target Pokémon.

card.name: Bill's Grassland
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Put a storage counter on Bill's Grassland. {T}, Remove one or more storage counters from Bill's Grassland: Add that much {W}, then add an additional {W}.

card.name: Bill's Volcano
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Put a storage counter on Bill's Volcano. {T}, Remove one or more storage counters from Bill's Volcano: Add that much {R}, then add an additional {R}.

card.name: Bill's Rainforest
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Put a storage counter on Bill's Rainforest. {T}, Remove one or more storage counters from Bill's Rainforest: Add that much {G}, then add an additional {G}.

card.name: Bill's Marsh
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Put a storage counter on Bill's Marsh. {T}, Remove one or more storage counters from Bill's Marsh: Add that much {B}, then add an additional {B}.

card.name: Bill's Coastline
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Put a storage counter on Bill's Coastline. {T}, Remove one or more storage counters from Bill's Coastline: Add that much {U}, then add an additional {U}.

card.name: Celadon City
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {G} or {W}. You lose 1 life.

card.name: Cerulean Cave
card.text: As Cerulean Cave enters, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {B}.

card.name: Cerulean City
card.text: As Cerulean City enters, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

card.name: Cinnabar Island
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {U} or {R}. You lose 1 life.

card.name: Cinnabar Lab
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {G} or {U}. You lose 1 life.

card.name: Cycling Road
Diglett's Cave
card.text: Digett's Cave enters tapped. {T}: Add {R}. {2}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Diglett's Cave: Destroy target artifact or nonbasic land.

card.name: Fuchsia City
card.text: As Fuchsia City enters, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {G}.

card.name: Game Corner
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {B} or {R}. You lose 1 life.

card.name: Indigo Plateau
Lavender Town
Mt. Moon
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {W} or {B}. You lose 1 life.

card.name: Pallet Town
card.text: Pallet Town enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color. {T}: Add {W}. {T}: Add one mana of the chosen color. Spend this mana only to cast Pokémon spells or activate abilities of Pokémon.

card.name: Pewter City
card.text: As Pewter City enters, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {G}.

card.name: Pewter Museum
card.text: {T}: Add {R} or {G}. You lose 1 life. {R}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Pewter Museum: Draw a card.

card.name: Pokémon Mansion
card.text: Pokémon Mansion enters tapped. {T}: Add {B}. {2}{B}, {T}: Target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Power Plant
card.text: As Power Plant enters, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {W}.

card.name: Rock Tunnel

card.text: {T}, Sacrifice Safari Zone: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Saffron City
card.text: {T}: Add {U} or {B}. You lose 1 life. {U}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Saffron City: Draw a card.

card.name: S.S. Anne
card.text: S.S. Anne enters tapped. {T}: Add {U}. {2}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice S.S. Anne: Return target Pokémon to its owner's hand.

card.name: Silph Co.
Vermilion City
card.text: {T}: Add {R} or {W}. You lose 1 life. {R}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Vermilion City: Draw a card.

card.name: Seafoam Islands
card.text: {T}: Add {W} or {U}. You lose 1 life. {W}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice Seafoam Islands: Draw a card.

card.name: Viridian City
card.text: {T}: Add {B}, or {G}. You lose 1 life. {B}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Viridian City: Draw a card.

card.name: Viridian Forest
card.text: Viridian Forest enters tapped. {T}: Add {G}. {2}, {T}: Add {G} for each Forest and each Bug Pokémon you control.

card.name: Brock Emblem
card.text: Whenever a source deals damage to a Pokémon you control, that Pokémon deals that much damage to that source's controller.

card.text: Pokémon you control have "{B}: This Pokémon can't be blocked this turn."
